com.rockyw.core.widget

类 CommonItemDecoration

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ItemDecoration
      • com.rockyw.core.widget.CommonItemDecoration

  • public class CommonItemDecoration
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ItemDecoration
    通用 RecyclerView 分割线 适用情况不断完善中..目前仅支持横向，纵向日后再说
